sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The maxcol function is used to determine the number of columns on the screen.
sections.text_content: The maxcol function is used to determine the number of columns on the screen.
sections.mdown_content: The **maxcol** function is used to** **determine the number of columns on the screen.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: For IBM PC compatibles as well as most UNIX dumb terminals, in "text" or "screen" mode, maxcol = 80. For the default IBM PC compatible "graphics" mode (CGA), maxcol = 40.
